title: Stephen Colbert On ‘Late Show’ Ending In Four Months: “It Feels Real Now. I’m Not Thrilled With It”
full_text: Stephen Colbert On ‘Late Show’ Ending In Four Months: “It Feels Real Now. I’m Not Thrilled With It”. Stephen Colbert is sharing his thoughts as the end of The Late Show revealed the date of the last show. The CBS late-night talk show is ending its run on Thursday, May 21, and while visiting Seth Meyers on Late Night, he weighed in on his sentiments over the ….
